query:
SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'successionCandidates' 
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('pdiPlanId', 'developmentPlanId');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'successionCandidates' 
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('pdiPlanId', 'developmentPlanId');
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE	COLUMN_DEFAULT
developmentPlanId	int	YES	NULL
